title: School Daze
description: Cheating, pranks, and detention. Relive the glory days.

cards.content: Never have I ever forged a parent's signature.
Never have I ever faked being sick to skip school.
Never have I ever cheated on a test.
Never have I ever fallen asleep in class.
Never have I ever been sent to the principal's office.
Never have I ever gotten detention.
Never have I ever copied someone's homework.
Never have I ever stuck gum under a desk.
Never have I ever had a crush on a teacher.
Never have I ever been suspended.
Never have I ever forgotten my gym clothes.
Never have I ever passed a note in class.
Never have I ever eaten lunch in the bathroom.
Never have I ever failed a class.
Never have I ever pulled a fire alarm.
Never have I ever gotten into a fistfight at school.
Never have I ever plagiarized an essay.
Never have I ever been bullied.
Never have I ever been a bully.
Never have I ever kissed someone under the bleachers.
Never have I ever skipped class to go off-campus.
Never have I ever lied about losing my homework.
Never have I ever been picked last for gym class.
Never have I ever thrown a paper airplane in class.
Never have I ever used SparkNotes instead of reading the book.
Never have I ever laughed so hard milk came out my nose.
Never have I ever been to Prom.
Never have I ever had a locker combination I couldn't open.
Never have I ever dissected a frog.
Never have I ever gotten lost in the school.
Never have I ever played hooky.
Never have I ever had a rumor spread about me.
Never have I ever spread a rumor.
Never have I ever worn a uniform to school.
Never have I ever called a teacher 'Mom'.
Never have I ever written on a desk.
Never have I ever had my phone confiscated.
Never have I ever participated in a talent show.
Never have I ever run for student council.
Never have I ever hid in the bathroom to avoid class.
Never have I ever had a braces mishap.
Never have I ever spiked the punch at a school dance.
Never have I ever gotten detention for talking.
Never have I ever ridden the school bus.
Never have I ever packed my own lunch.
Never have I ever traded lunch items.
Never have I ever failed a driving test.
Never have I ever dated someone from another school.
Never have I ever cried in the nurse's office.
Never have I ever walked home from school.
Never have I ever been the teacher's pet.
Never have I ever prank called a teacher.
Never have I ever used a fake excuse for being late.
Never have I ever stolen lunch money.
Never have I ever had a secret handshake.
Never have I ever been on a sports team.
Never have I ever broken a bone at recess.
Never have I ever ruined a school textbook.
Never have I ever graduated with honors.
Never have I ever wanted to go back to high school.
